Protocols

Protocols are groups of standard orders that can be added to a patient chart together. Users can modify the protocols for different situations by editing and removing unneeded orders without changing the protocol in the database.

A default protocol is typically associated with a template to populate flowsheets automatically with basic orders at the start of a session.

l Modify a protocol

l Delete a protocol
